text: Finally Alone (Konecne sami) is a 1940 Czechoslovak comedy film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Rùzena Nasková, Natasa Gollová, Miroslav Homola. ==References== ==External links== *Finally Alone at the Internet Movie Database Category:1940 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak comedy films Category:1940 comedy films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Finally Alone
